Description: 2012 Charvel Desolation Star Up for sale is a shredtastic 2012 Charvel Desolation Star in its original white finish. This example features dual EMG humbuckers, Floyd Rose tremolo system w/ locking nut, and an incredibly cool body design. Overall in very good condition less some minor dings and light play wear. Pro setup in-house! No case with this one.
